subSections.title: Readings
Usage notes
subSections.text: When written in {{m|ja|草体|tr=sōtai||highly-[[cursive]]}} style, this ''kanji'' form is called {{m|ja|永様|tr=ei-sama|lit={{ja-l|永}}-[[form]]}} to distinguish from {{m|ja|次様|tr=tsugi-zama|pos=for {{ja-l|檨}}|lit={{ja-l|次}}-form}}, {{m|ja|美様|tr=bi-zama|pos=for {{ja-l|𣖙}}|lit={{ja-l|美}}-form}}, and {{m|ja|平様|tr=hira-zama|pos=for ''shinjitai'' form {{ja-l|様}}|lit=[[common]] form}}.
